long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:
●  Source candidates with ease, and save data entry time
    - Resume title & candidate location
    - Work Experience History
    - Education History
    - Skills
●  Avoid duplicates
●  Easy to setup & use
● Along with the Profile Details of the Candidate, the extension will allow users to download the CV of the candidate. The CV is a file attachment which is available for downlaod through a link on the same page.


──────────────────────────────
⚠ You need a Klimb account to use this extension, sign up from https://www.klimb.io/
